mapper.select: select count(1) from SysUser where tel=#{tel}
select c.* from SysRole a,SysUserRole b,SysUser c where a.id=#{roleId} and a.id=b.roleId and b.userId=c.id

select a.id, a.code, a.createDate, a.name, a.state, a.ord, a.memo, a.createTime, a.modifyTime, a.createUserId, a.modifyUserId, a.headFile, a.type, a.level, a.company, a.companyType, a.industry, a.country, a.province, a.city, a.region, a.address, a.scale, a.tel, a.phone, a.email, a.idCard, a.idCardFile, a.fax, a.credit, a.licenseFile, a.position, a.technicalTitle, a.profession, a.professionalLife, a.education, a.school, a.unionId, a.password, a.sex, a.birthday, a.departmentId from SysUser a where a.id=#{id}
select id,name from SysUser a where a.state=#{state}
select * from SysUser a where a.password=#{password} and ( a.code=#{code} || a.tel=#{tel} || a.email=#{email})

select a.*,c.userId as _id ,b.name departmentName from SysUser a left join SysUserRole c on a.id=c.userId and a.type=1 and c.roleId=#{roleId} left join SysDepartment b on a.departmentId=b.id where a.state=0 order by _id desc,a.departmentId, CAST(a.code as SIGNED)

select a.*,b.name departmentName from SysUser a left join SysDepartment b on a.departmentId=b.id where a.state=0 and a.name like #{userName} and a.type=1
select a.*,b.name departmentName from(select a.*,case when b.id is null then ''else a.id end AS _id from SysUser a left join SysDepartment b on a.departmentId=b.id and b.id=#{departmentId}) as a left join SysDepartment b on a.departmentId=b.id where a.state=0
order by _id desc, CAST(a.code as SIGNED)

select id, parentId pId,name title,cast(id as char) value,ord from sysdepartment where state=0 union all select id, departmentId pId,name title,cast(id as char) value ,ord from sysuser where state=0 and departmentId is not null and departmentId!=-1 order by pid,ord
